Well, you are right. Not completely finished, but there is an interview with Johny in wich he says that they finished recording it.

WTF dude they don't toy us. This sub trolls itself. All that Radiohead did is announce that the album is finished. They didn't say when to expect the release. We made theories, we are hyping ourselves like retards, not them.

Uff, ne znam, slab sam tu. Znam da je moj ale kupovao razne knjige ali ne seam se nijedne. Siguran sam da vee izdavake kue poput Vulkana ili Lagune imaju makar nekii izbor domae epske fantastike. Potrai i na sajtu Delfi knjiara.
Slovenska mitologija je uvek kul, ima hiljadu knjiga na tu temu.
Hahahah "rezident evil i matriks imali dete koje nije sranje holivudski film" Vie volim psiholoke i klasike :)

itao sam uglavnom starije pisce, jer smo to to i radili iz gradiva na asovima srpskog jezika. Oboavam Crnjanskog, Selimovia, Miodraga Pavlovia, antia, Rakia i td. Shvatio sam da, to se tie nove literature, nisam naitan. Planiram da pratim dobitnike NIN-ove nagrade i itam njihove knjige.

WRITING.TITLE: Savremeni dobri srpski pisci?
WRITING.TEXT: Ima li ovde knjievnika ili italaca? Da li znate neke kvalitetne savremene (i mlae) srpske psice koji danas stvaraju?
Yep, me neither :(
Thom actually performed with Atoms For Peace here in Serbia on Exit. He had a T-shirt "We come in peace" or something like that. I still regret not going to that concert.

I'm 18. I started listening to them few years ago. At first I didn't like them at all. I did not get it why would anyone listen to this. Then I let go of my superstitions and just felt the music. For the first time I actually understood them, I just enjoyed it. I let every little bit of their sound go through me. Now, this is my favourite band hands down. I'm grateful to them because they changed the way i think and listen, they change me whole in many ways. I can't wait to hear the new album, I hope it will be a challenging listen. Let's see if tomorrow wil disappoint

Thank you for the link! It helped me find this: http://www.enjoythemusic.com/magazine/music/0513/rock/atoms_for_peace_amok.htm It mentions little something about inscriptions, also I learned what dead wax is :D
I have no idea how they did that but i leik it!

WRITING.TITLE: This is regarding Atoms For Peace: On their AMOK album there is sort of a secret text engraved on each record.
WRITING.TEXT:
If you put it together in order it says:
Little fireworks of joy Tying round reels of strings Just having their fun Trying to get your atrention
Do we know who wrote that? It would be cool if this handwritten text that I'm looking at right now was from a bend member.
